Text: I'm more than happy to seed otherwise I wouldn't have posted it but I'm not going to do it alone.  Initial seeding session was five hours...I'll go for a few more.  If others are not going to start helping keep this torrent alive why should I waste my time?

Quick Dload and good quaility!
I watched & recorded this back in the 80s on my 10KG VCR (yes, they were massive!) but that tape has been lost to the destruction of time, but this is a wonderful insight to the making of the trilogy & a must for any die hard (pre prequel!) fan. Agree with the Uploader when he says "before Lucas went insane and began destroying both his masterpiece and my childhood". Too true!!!! 
Now picture this: Jules & Vincent in Pulp Fiction with Jar Jar Binks in the back seat!!! "Aww Shit! I just shot Jar Jar in the face"!!!!!!
yeah i second that insanity hypothesis

With like a half TRILLION dollars: I think he can afford to be a tad nutty! To most kids, this is as close to ANY religion they will ever get. Child molesting priests and red velvet have pretty much secured that!
FYI: Chinese subtitling across a LARGE portion of the lower screen. Quality no better than Youtube clips also!
Thanks, man. Much like kevster1976, I watched this on a recorded VHS tape, however it was lost over time. Great to see it again.
